definitions.definition: two things of the same appearance and size that are intended to be used together, or something that consists of two parts joined together:
two people who have a romantic relationship or are doing something together:
examples: They seem a very happy pair.

definitions.definition: two animals that come together to have sex and produce young:
to make something one of a pair, or to become one of a pair:
examples: Famous paintings have been paired with poems by Sandburg, Angelou, and others.
